text: Vyacheslav Nikolayevich Vorobyov (; born 27 November 1962) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Tighina players
title: Vyacheslav Vorobyov
